title: Azalea

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may shoot a target at night except Night 1.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If someone visits your target, you will shoot them instead.
- If more than one player visits your target, you will shoot no one.
- You may only shoot two times.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to shoot (player)."
"You spotted a visitor, you shot them instead!"
"There were too many visitors around, you stayed in the bushes instead."
"Your target's defense was too strong to kill."
"Your target's visitor's defense was too strong to kill."

"You were shot by an Azalea!" (when shot by an Azalea)
"You were shot by an Azalea when visiting your target!" (when visiting an Azalea's target)
"They were shot by an Azalea." (death message during the day)

desc:
Post 154
*You are an insurgent who dedicates her skills in archery to the Florae.*
